idea-plugin.change-notes: <html> <dl> <dt>0.1.9</dt> <dd>Added a setting for whitespace between braces</dd> <dt>0.1.8</dt> <dd>Fixing bug introduced by autocomplete with invalid elements (had to "revert" to old method of autocomplete, so I need to find a new approach for invalid elements</dd> <dt>0.1.7</dt> <dd>Focusing on WebStorm 7 compatibility</dd> <dt>0.1.6</dt> <dd>Adding navigation, auto-closing {{, attribute autocomplete on all elements, and "jump to docs"</dd> <dt>0.1.5</dt> <dd>Adding "href" and "disabled" to the descriptors list</dd> <dt>0.1.4</dt> <dd>Bundling live templates thanks to Powel Kozlowski</dd> <dt>0.1.3</dt> <dd>Adding the mouse events and a couple other missing directives</dd> <dt>0.1.2</dt> <dd>Works with any doctype (not just !doctype html).</dd> <dt>0.1.1</dt> <dd>Changed Autocomplete approach to "provide" custom autocompletes through a provider extension point. I'll revisit a custom DTD after more discussion/thought with other developers. </dd> <dt>0.1</dt> <dd>Basic ng attribute autocompletion based on an included DTD.</dd> </dl> </html>
